string.comment: Menu for getting started

string.comment: Menu item to enable Keyman as system keyboard

string.comment: Menu item to set Keyman as default system keyboard

resources.string: Affat Keyman man keyboard kol ɗughwana

string.comment: Open the Keyman for Android help page

string.name: show_get_started
string.comment: Show the "Get Started" menu on startup

string.name: request_storage_permission
string.comment: Request storage permission to access keyboard packages

resources.string: Ka funt keyboard packages, avathla Keyman wativa jangat ina fal ta bileke.

string.name: storage_permission_denied
string.comment: Keyboard package installation may fail since Android storage permission not granted

resources.string: Wativa fata ɗowlo thlaha thlaha. Kaɗa ha da fant keyboard package wo

string.comment: Settings menu title

string.comment: Menu item to install keyboard or dictionary

string.comment: Menu action to change interface language

resources.string: Ina ta faftal jiv tadiye k vinda an kompitaina ta faftal jiv tadiye k vinda an kompita

string.comment: Spacebar caption hint - blank

resources.string: Eh marantaka t caption taghan spacebar

string.name: haptic_feedback
string.comment: haptic feedback on key press

string.name: show_banner
string.comment: text suggestions banner

resources.string: Ko ngawa an mara t banner

string.comment: Description when toggle is on

string.name: show_banner_off
string.comment: Description when toggle is off

resources.string: Vita haɗuwo, kawai t marantal predictive text vita hahaɗe

string.name: show_send_crash_report
string.comment: permission for sending crash reports

resources.string: Avathla t tsaghat gwaɗha tabga tala taghan network

string.name: show_send_crash_report_on
string.comment: Description when toggle is on

resources.string: Vita tadeɗe, gwaɗha tabga tala an jivan jivo da tsighaptal jebe

string.name: show_send_crash_report_off
string.comment: Description when toggle is off

resources.string: Vita haɗ tadewo, gwaɗan jivan jivo hal da tsighapta jebwo

string.comment: Confirmation to add bookmark

string.comment: Notification when no touch-optimized keyboards can be installed

resources.string: Keyboard package has no touch-optimized keyboards to install

string.comment: Notification when no dictionaries can be installed

resources.string: Ha wuliwa predictive text anga fantawo

string.comment: Notification when a package doesn't contain keyboards or dictionaries

resources.string: Ha keyboards ko predictive text anga fantawo

string.name: no_associated_languages
string.comment: Notification when a keyboard package doesn't contain languages

resources.string: Keyboard package na haɗ nda gwaɗa luwunda garavata da fantal wo

string.name: invalid_metadata
string.comment: kmp.json metadata file is invalid or missing in package

string.name: minimum_keyboard_version_not_supported
string.comment: Notification when keyboard has functionality not supported by current Keyman

resources.string: Keyboard requires a newer version of Keyman

string.name: unable_to_open_browser
string.comment: Notification when a browser activity cannot be launched
